name: Road of Nuya
description:
The Road of Nuya is a simple sandbox RPG with elements of visual novel and generation. This game developing by one person. At the moment Road of Nuya on an early stage of development, in the game you can complete two simple quests through battle and buy equipments for received rewards.

English localization is work in progress and I bad know English. So the translation maybe not of high quality. I'm sorry. You can write to me about mistakes in translation.
